title: Developing Teacher Coaching Session Expressions: Supporting Science Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Analyzing and representing dialogic interactions and instructional design processes in online science teacher coaching sessions

learning_goals: Learners can analyze conversational interactions in teacher coaching sessions using the T-SEDA coding framework
Learners can systematically document the instructional design development process through visual representations
Learners can produce reports effectively conveying the coach's roles (conversation initiator and learning design facilitator) in coaching sessions
Learners can compare diverse coaching cases to propose optimal science education design strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
